verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G379>inexcusable<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, whoever you <S%G3956>are<s%> that <S%G2919>judges<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1722%G99999>where<s%> you <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, you <S%G2632>condemn<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>you<s%> that <S%G2919>judge<s%> do the same <S%G4238>things<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> we are <S%G1492>sure<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them which <S%G4238>commit<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> do <S%G3049>you<s%> think <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, that <S%G2919>judge<s%> them which <S%G4238>do<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> shall <S%G1628>escape<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do <S%G2706>you<s%> despise the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5544>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G463>forbearance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>; not <S%G50>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5543>goodness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>leads<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>?

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4643>hardness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G279>impenitent<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> treasures <S%G2343>up<s%> to <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the righteous <S%G1341>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;
<S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G591>render<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>:

To <S%G3588>them<s%> who <S%G2596>by<s%> patience <S%G5281>continue<s%> in <S%G18>well<s%> <S%G2041>doing<s%> seek <S%G2212>for<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G861>immortality<s%>, <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G2052>contentious<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> do not <S%G544>obey<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>, <S%G2372>indignation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>,

<S%G2347>Tribulation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4730>anguish<s%>, <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G2716>does<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Gentile<s%>;

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2532>glory<s%>, <S%G5092>honor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G2038>works<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>, to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Gentile<s%>:
<S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> without <S%G460>law<s%> <S%G622>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> without <S%G460>law<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>;

<S%G1063>(For<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G202>hearers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G1344>justified<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G4160>do<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> contained in the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3778>these<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1526>are<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves<s%>:

<S%G3748>Which<s%> <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1123>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> also bearing <S%G4828>witness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G3053>thoughts<s%> <S%G3342>meanwhile<s%> <S%G2723>accusing<s%> or <S%G2228%G99999>else<s%> <S%G626>excusing<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>;)

<S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.

<S%G1492>Behold<s%>, <S%G4771>you<s%> are <S%G2028>called<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1879>rest<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> make your <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> his <S%G2307>will<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1381>approve<s%> the things that are more <S%G1308>excellent<s%>, being <S%G2727>instructed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>;

<S%G5037>And<s%> are confident <S%G3982>that<s%> you <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G1511>are<s%> a <S%G3595>guide<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind<s%>, a <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G3588>them<s%> which are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>,

A <S%G3810>instructor<s%> of the <S%G878>foolish<s%>, a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G3516>babes<s%>, which <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G3588>You<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> which <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, teach <S%G1321>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%>? you that <S%G2784>preach<s%> a man should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%>, do you <S%G2813>steal<s%>?

You that <S%G3004>say<s%> a man should <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, do you commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>? you that <S%G948>abhor<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%>, do you commit <S%G2416>sacrilege<s%>?
You <S%G3739>that<s%> make your <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3847>breaking<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G818>dishonor<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Nations<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G5623>profits<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4238>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G1510>be<s%> a <S%G3848>breaker<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, shall <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> be <S%G3049>counted<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> shall <S%G2919>not<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> which is <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%>, if it <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> do <S%G3848>transgress<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, which is <S%G3588%G99999>one<s%> <S%G5318>outwardly<s%>; <S%G3761>neither<s%> is that <S%G1722>circumcision<s%>, which is <S%G5318>outward<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> is a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, which is <S%G3588%G99999>one<s%> <S%G2927>inwardly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is that of the <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, and <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G1121>letter<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.
